sentences.en: Fame hasn't torn her away from her beloved Liverpool.
sentences.cn: 功成名就之后她还是舍不得离开她深爱的利物浦。

sentences.en: He lost his beloved wife last year.
He never recovered from the death of his beloved daughter.
sentences.cn: 他一直没有走出失去爱女的阴影。

sentences.en: He takes his beloved into his arms.
sentences.cn: 他将心爱之人拥入怀中。

sentences.en: He’s always talking about his beloved computer!
sentences.cn: 他老是在谈论他的宝贝电脑！

sentences.en: It was a gift from her beloved.
sentences.cn: 那是她心爱的人送的礼物。

sentences.en: She longs for the early return of her beloved.
sentences.cn: 她盼着心上人早日归来.

sentences.en: She mourned for the beloved past.
She refused to be parted from her beloved cat.
sentences.cn: 她拒绝和她心爱的猫分开.

sentences.en: She refuses to see her beloved boy die in such dishonor.
sentences.cn: 她不愿看到她深爱的男友就这样不名誉地死去。

sentences.en: Strangely enough, the last thing he thought of was his beloved Tanya.
sentences.cn: 说来也怪，他最后想到的才是他心爱的塔尼娅。

sentences.en: The bright plumage of a parrot made it beloved by people.
sentences.cn: 鹦鹉的一身华丽羽毛使人们很爱它.

sentences.en: the deep purple flowers so beloved by artists
sentences.cn: 受艺术家青睐的深紫色花

sentences.en: The rose is the most romantic of flowers, beloved of poets, singers, and artists.
sentences.cn: 玫瑰是最浪漫的花，深受诗人、歌手和艺术家的喜爱。

trans.tran_en: someone who is loved very much
